Name: Pottery shabti
Description: A small shabti made from clay with a blue colourwash. The figure carries two hoes and has a square basket on it's back. The eyes are detailed in black and on the plain wig is a simple seshed-headband, knotted at the back. Down the front is a single line of text, now effaced, within a black border. The shabti is quite crude and has a flat back.
